name: Triple Baller
description:
Made for an NYU course I'm taking.

Guide three different balls through increasingly difficult courses and challenges! Be careful since the balls get increasingly faster and more slippery with every level! Use the arrow keys to move and WASD to control the camera. If at any point you need to figure out where to go, look for the beam of light coming from the door!

I made a few custom textures for this game, like the anti-cheese sign and all the signs telling the player what to do. I also figured out how to get the music to not loop on death and get different tracks for each level, which should make levels 2 and 3 significantly less annoying. 

Music:

  • Level 1 - Gaur Plain (Day) - Xenoblade Chronicles
  • Level 2 - Mor Ardain - Roaming the Wastes - Xenoblade Chronicles 2
  • Level 3 - Valak Mountain (Day) - Xenoblade Chronicles
  • End Screen - Results - Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Eyes of Heaven
